My prize
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Filk Songs: My prize
By blackdevil on Wednesday, August 16, 2006 - 03:46 pm:

to the tune of (my humps)

watcha gonna do wit all dat junk,all dat junk
inside that ranch...imma get get get get u drunk,get u love drunk off my prize,my prize my prize,my prize my prize my prize,my lovely little win,check it out

I drive Coltia crazy
I do it on the daily
She treats me really badly
She never buys me me-at

all i ever ge-et,is potatos and fi-ish
i wanna,kick her a55 so she will learn her goddamned lesson

whether I ain't training
and no I ain't training
we can keep on failin
now keep on cheatin a lot

my prize,my prize my prize my prize
my prize my prize my prize
my lovely little win,check it out..

i met colt,down at the disco
she said hey hey yeah let's go
i could be your trainer,you could be my monster
let's spend time not money

mix yo ranch with my training skills
training training training
mix yo ranch,with my training skills
training training ri-ight

they say i have lotsa power
the monsters wanna beat me
they always fightin me all day
always fightin me all day
tryin to win my prize prize
lookin at my win win

you can look but you can't touch it if u touch it imma,start some drama,you don't want no drama
no no drama,no no no no drama
so don't pull on my win boy
you ain't my trainer
i'm just tryin to train boy
and get a prize

my prize,my prize my prize my prize
my prize my prize my prize
my prize my prize my prize
my lovely little win
my lovely little win
my lovely little win,they always wanna fight
my prize has got them

it's got me training oh!
spendin all ur trainin on me,and spendin time on me
it's got me training oh!
spendin all ur trainin on me,on me,on me

By Sturnum94 on Thursday, August 17, 2006 - 12:06 pm:

Oooookaaaayyy. That was very song-related. I can actually hum the song, and say the words, and they seem to match. Good song.
